attributes.action: Petition to stop a second EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: All citizens that registered and voted in the EU referendum agreed by their vote to the terms of polling, either a vote to remain or to leave, the democratic vote was taken and the leave vote was granted by majority. Other votes of the past affecting our lives such as General elections where there was a hung or divided parliament there was no such request for a second election. This is mis-management of the democratic right and rule of our society.
attributes.background: Preventing a miscarriage of British trust in our legal and voting systems by those who do not accept  democratic majority rule
